card.note: Good things come to those who believe, better things come to those who are patient, and the best things come to those who don't give up.
card.author: Love, Mom & Dad

card.note: Do what you Love the most.
card.author: From Jill Hieronimus

card.note: As you graduate, please remember to keep an open mind and give yourself a chance to explore all the "flavors" of experiences. Stay true to your beautiful self and keep God in your daily routine. May you experience every success and happiness life has to offer.
card.author: Sincerely, The Kenworthy Family

card.note: Follow your heart in all you do./R
card.author: Christine Smith

card.note: To Trust Your Intuition!
card.author: With Love ~ The Crouthamel Family

card.note: Life is too Short, to wake up in the morning with regrets. So LOVE the people who treat you right FORGIVE the ones that don't and believe that EVERYTHING happens for a Reason!
card.author: Love, Aunt Lisa

card.note: NEVER give up!
card.author: Brandon

card.note: To Make a difference in someones life you don't have to be brilliant, rich, beautiful or perfect. You just need to have to care enough to be there.,
card.author: Connor

card.note: The past is your LESSON. The present is your GIFT. The future is your MOTIVATION. Reach for your dreams.
card.author: Uncle Kevin

card.note: One of your Grandpa's favorite sayings was../R"And Away We Go"...And away you go My Dear, off to the real world of Carolyn. So Shoulders Back, Chin Up, Smile..../RYou Can Handle This!
card.author: Love you much , Grandma

card.note: Don't ask, just Embrace
card.author: Rob

card.note: Always keep smiling and remember when things seem hard your Delone family will always be here cheering you on. You're a wonderful young woman with a bright future ahead!
card.author: Much Love, Sherry Grenchik

card.note: Get to know your professors. They can be a great blessing to you.
card.author: Rosemary Wivagg

card.note: Build relationships and don't burn bridges. We live in a competitive world and access to resources is crucial for attaining personal and career goals. Being able to call old friends/family and colleagues for advice and guidance will be a valuable resource.
card.author: Raymond T. Gallagher

card.note: Carolyn, we've watched you grow into a beautiful, talented, and confident young woman over the past 6 years. Hold onto that self-confidence and believe in yourself in all that you set out to accomplish. Rely on your inner strength, have faith that things will work out.
card.author: Love, Mr. & Mrs. Henry

card.note: Always remember how special your are!
card.author: With Love, The Smith Family

card.note: Never settle for anything less than you deserve whether its future jobs, relationships, or goals. Always go in with a positive attitude regardless of the situation. Best of luck!
card.author: Lauren (Kwiatkowski) Markle

card.note: Don't let others dictate your future.
card.author: Niki Swingler

card.note: Don't be reckless with people's hearts and don't put up with people who are reckless with yours.
card.author: Niki Swingler

card.note: To know that each day is a new start, a fresh beginning. We are confident that God's mercies are new every morning and the steadfast love of the Lord never ceases (Lamentations 3:22-23).
card.author: Love, Mrs. DeSales Hernandez

card.note: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step. Whenever you feel yourself sinking, just take the next step and trust "This too shall pass and God's mercies are new every morning and He will renew your strength as His love endures forever."
card.author: Mrs. DeSales Hernandez

card.note: Share your sparkle in all your future endeavors !! /R/R~ Best Wishes Always!!
card.author: Tres, Francesca,Bella&Ava Sapp

card.note: Remember to stay curious about your own self and others. Everyone has something important to say or share, and we all have amazing potential to unlock through lifelong learning.
card.author: Aunt Grace and Uncle Rusty

card.note: Be kind to yourself and others, and try to make a positive difference each day. As said so perfectly in Aesop's Fables, "No act of kindness is ever wasted."
card.author: Aunt Grace and Uncle Rusty

card.note: Querida Tina,/R/RHa sido un placer tenerte en las clases de /REspaÃ±ol. Tu has sido una estudiante excelente en tu comportamiento. Gracias por tu ayuda en todo. Buena suerte en la universidad. Ven a visitarme.
card.author: Doctora Brown

card.note: Dream your dreams because your dreams of today are your deeds of tomorrow.
card.author: Charlie McGough

card.note: Fear is the mind-killer. Fear is the little-death that brings total obliteration. I will face my fear. I will permit it to pass over me and through me. Where the fear has gone there will be nothing. Only I will remain.
card.author: Bene Gesserit proverb (Dune)

card.note: It does not do to dwell on dreams and forget to live. /R/RAlbus Dumbledore from Harry Potter & The Sorcerer's Stone
card.author: Dad

card.note: It is our choices...that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities./R/RJ.K. Rowling
card.author: Dad

card.note: Whoever is happy will make others happy too./R/RAnne Frank
card.author: Dad

card.note: Despite everything, I believe that people are really good at heart./R/RAnne Frank
card.author: Dad

card.note: Do not take life so seriously and have fun. Life is too short to do it any other way.
card.author: Mrs. Colleen Lopes

card.note: Our beliefs become our thoughts. Our thoughts become our words. Our words become our habits. Our habits become our values. Our values become our destiny./R/RGandhi
card.author: Dad

card.note: Spend time with positive people.
card.author: Mrs. Julia Hawbaker

card.note: One's destination is never a place, but a new way of seeing things. /R/RHenry Miller
card.author: Dad

card.note: Credit belongs to the person in the arena whose face is marred by dust and sweat not the critic on the sideline./R/RTheodore Roosevelt
card.author: Dad

card.note: University is where you learn how to think.
card.author: Charlie McGough

card.note: 15 minutes more.
card.author: Dad

card.note: Every night go to bed with a plan for tomorrow.
card.author: Carolyn McGough (namesake)

card.note: Be curious.
card.author: Dad

card.note: Actions have consequences - good or bad.
card.author: Bernadette McGough

card.note: Sparkles
card.author: Dad

card.note: You never stand alone.
card.author: Love, Mom & Dad

card.note: Mind your own plate.
card.author: Mame Convery

card.note: Life is what happens while you are making other plans./R/RJohn Lennon
card.author: Dad

card.note: Dreams transform into thoughts. And thoughts result in action.
card.author: Dad

card.note: Carolyn, you have grown up to be a smart, beautiful young woman. We know you will be successful in all you do and we are so very proud of you. Love you and can't wait to hear about all of your college experiences.Believe in yourself and all you do,as we believe in u
card.author: Love,Marie,Craig,Faith,Grace&Marah

card.note: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams. /R/REleanor Roosevelt
card.author: The Murrin Family

card.note: Congratulations on your Graduation Carolyn! What a fine young lady you have grown into! We wish you all the best as you embark on your future, and remember that nothing worth having comes without sacrifice so welcome the big challenges if your heart and mind say go!
card.author: The Trummers

card.note: See a world in a grain of sand and heaven in a wild flower, hold infinity in the palm of your hand and eternity in an hour./R/RWilliam Blake
card.author: Gavin McGough

card.note: If you can't make it better, you can laugh at it./R/RErma Bombeck
card.author: Chase McGough

card.note: Women have to be active listeners and interrupters - but when you interrupt, you have to know what you are talking about./R/RMadeleine Albright
card.author: Willa McGough

card.note: Cadillac Mountain. Pop overs. Sand beach. You can do more than you think you can. Drink water, take a rain coat, and ask for help when you need it.
card.author: Aunt Kate & Uncle David

card.note: Congratulations on graduating from DCHS! Always treat every day as a new day. Use your previous experiences as a step to new beginnings. Always respect the people that helped you get to this point. You may need them as a friend again someday. Good Luck!
card.author: Bill, Donna, Amanda, Sarah Adams

card.note: Always strive to do your best and be kind and patient.
card.author: Chrissy, Chad and Zoey Smith

card.note: Shoot for the stars Carolyn and always be true to who you are! Your sparkling personality will take you anywhere you want to go. Dream big!
card.author: Team Warner: Jeff, Amy & Victoria

card.note: Always keep God in your heart, those who need His help in your prayers, and your family and friends only a phone call away! Congratulations Carolyn on your high school graduation. Be safe and stay as beautiful as you are now, both inside and out! Much Love,
card.author: Jim, Ginger & Aaron Slagle

card.note: "Deep in the sea are riches beyond compare. But if you seek safety it is on the shore." Saadi/R/R"Only when you have crossed the river, can you say the crocodile has a lump on his snout." Ashanti/R/R"Jesus Christ is the same yesterday, today, and forever." Hebrews 13:8
card.author: Mr./Mrs. Kelly Penny and Hunter

card.note: The time you spend alone with God will transform your character and increase your devotion. Then your integrity and godly behavior in an unbelieving world will make others long to know the Lord./R/RCharles Stanley
card.author: Aleshia Hawkins

card.note: Courage is the resistance to fear; mastery of fear, not absence of fear./R/RMark Twain
card.author: Dad

card.note: Get out of the care and see what there is to see.
card.author: Dad

card.note: I am running the vacuum cleaner because she has to learn to sleep through all sorts of things in life. (While you sleeping in the bassinet shortly after bringing you home and Grandmother was helping Mom)
card.author: Bernadette McGough

card.note: New experiences are exercises for the mind and soul.
card.author: Dad

card.note: Moderation in all things.
card.author: Carolyn McGough (namesake)

card.note: A ship in a harbor is safe, but that is not what ships are built for./R/RWilliam Shedd
card.author: Dad

card.note: Keep your eyes on the prize./R/RUnknown
card.author: Dad

card.note: Trust God from the bottom of your heart; do not try to figure everything out on your own. Listen for God's voice in everything you do, everywhere you go; He is the one who will keep you on track. Proverbs 3:5-6
card.author: Mickey & Brooke Dennis

card.note: Live your life with Integrity and Honesty whether people know it or not. Choose Compassion and Kindness over criticism. With intentionality, work hard and play hard.
card.author: Love, Maura (Marybeth) Gallagher

card.note: Have the courage to say no. Have the courage to face the truth. Do the right thing because it is right. These are the magic keys to living your life with integrity./R/RW. Clement Stone
card.author: Hawkins Family

card.note: Character contributes to beauty. It fortifies a woman as her youth fades. A mode of conduct, a standard of courage, discipline, fortitude, and integrity can do a great deal to make a woman beautiful./R/RJacqueline Bisset
card.author: Aleshia Hawkins

card.note: It's Showtime!
card.author: Dad

card.note: Always be a first-rate version of yourself, instead of a second-rate version of somebody else./R/RJudy Garland
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: If we all did the things we are capable of doing, we would literally astound ourselves./R/RThomas Edison
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: There are many wonderful things that will never be done if you do not do them./R/RCharles D. Gil
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: God gives us dreams a size too big so that we can grow into them./R/RAuthor Unknown
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: Life is not about discovering our talents; it is about pushing our talents to the limit and discovering our genius./R/RRobert Brault
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: In response to those who say to stop dreaming and face reality, I say keep dreaming and make reality./R/R-Author Unknown
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars./R/RLes Brown
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: Education is the most powerful weapon which you can use to change the world./R/RNelson Madela
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: The world needs dreamers and the world needs doers. But above all, the world needs dreamers who do./R/RSarah Ban Breathanch
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising every time we fail./R/RRalph Waldo Emerson
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: If you can imagine it, you can achieve it; it you can dream it, you can become it. /R/RWilliam Arthur Ward
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: If opportunity doesn't knock, build a door./R/RMilton Berle
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: You have to expect things of yourself before you can do them./R/RMichael Jordan
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: Don't let anyone steal your dream. It's your dream, not theirs./R/RDan Zadra
card.author: Love Mom

card.note: Share your sparkle wherever you are.
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: Wheresoever you go, go with all your heart./R/RKongzi
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: What we are is God's gift to us. What we become is our gift to God./R/REleanor Powell
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: You have brains in your head./RYou can steer yourself in any direction you choose./RYou're on your own./RAnd you know what you know./RYou are the girl who'll decide where to go./R/RDr. Seuss
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: Whether you think you can or think you can't - you are right./R/RHenry Ford
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: Have patience with all things, but chiefly have patience with yourself. Do not lose courage in considering your imperfections, but instantly set about remedying them, every day being the task anew./R/RSt. Francis de Sales
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: Happiness can only be achieved by looking inward and learning to enjoy whatever life has, and this requires transforming greed into gratitude./R/RSt. John Chrysostom
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: God, give me grace to accept the things that cannot be changed, Courage to change the things which should be changed, and to distinguish the one from the other. Amen.
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: The ultimate measure of a man (or woman) is not where he stands in moments of moments of comfort and convenience, but where he stands at a time of challenge and controversy./R/RDr. Marin Luther King, Jr.
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face. You must do the thing which you think you cannot do./R/REleanor Roosevelt
card.author: Love, Mom

card.note: When you come to the end of your rope, tie a knot and hang on./R/RFranklin D. Roosevelt
card.author: Love, Mom
